This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com

item.title: New Answers for Diabetes via The AIM Program of Energetic Balancing
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: The frequency of diabetes is discussed by Stephen Lewis and participants of The AIM Program of Energetic Healing, including how these members of this program have used AIM to help them self heal and balance the frequency of Diabetes in their consciousness. Host: Mike Connor Produced by Kevin Foresman for The Highest Ground Podcast
item.itunes:author: kforesman
item.itunes:subtitle: New Answers for Diabetes via The AIM Program of Energetic Balancing

item.title: Sanctuary Now: Today's Path to Consciousness
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: During this talk cast, Stephen Lewis, coauthor of Sanctuary: The Path To Consciousness, updates us as to what has been learned and addresses since the original publishing of Sanctuary, and how this has effected and benefited The AIM Program of Energetic Balancing. Enjoy this discussion of our current state of energetic healing and consciousness. Host Mike Connor - www.emc2consciousness.com, Produced by Kevin Foresman - www.kevinforesman.com
item.itunes:author: kforesman
item.itunes:subtitle: Sanctuary Now: Today's Path to Consciousness

item.title: The Frequecies of Addictions and AIM
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: In this special edition of "Everything Is Energy," Host Mike Connor and Stephen Lewis, developer of The AIM Program of Energetic Balancing, interview Live callers who are participants in The Aim Program and have selected balancing frequencies through this technology to heal their addictions and create a new sense of freedom in their lives.

item.itunes:subtitle: The Frequecies of Addictions and AIM
item.itunes:summary: In this special edition of "Everything Is Energy," Host Mike Connor and Stephen Lewis, developer of The AIM Program of Energetic Balancing, interview Live callers who are participants in The Aim Program and have selected balancing frequencies through this technology to heal their addictions and create a new sense of freedom in their lives.

item.title: Experience "The Psychic Gallery" with Kathleen Tucci and Debbie Fletcher
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: "The Psychic Gallery" is a spectacular, entertaining experience where you can increase your knowledge of the supernatural and learn to connect with loved ones in spirit. Whether helping you listen to intuition, understanding future events, or contacting spirits who have crossed over, psychic mediums and authors Kathleen Tucci and Debbie Fletcher focus on specific paranormal topics revealing secrets and mysteries of this world and the hereafter. Join in on the conversation regarding psychic awareness and call in to participate in live on-air readings as Kathleen and Debbie help us vibrate to spirits from the other side on this special two hour episode of The Highest Ground. Host: Kevin Foresman
item.itunes:author: kforesman
item.itunes:subtitle: Experience "The Psychic Gallery" with Kathleen Tucci and Debbie Fletcher
item.itunes:summary: "The Psychic Gallery" is a spectacular, entertaining experience where you can increase your knowledge of the supernatural and learn to connect with loved ones in spirit. item.title: The Concepts of Healing and Consciousness on The Highest Ground
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: Since everything is energy, anything is possible. During this talk cast, Stephen Lewis, coauthor of Sanctuary: The Path To Consciousness, discusses the potential for physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual healing as it relates to lifting your consciousness higher, removing imbalances in consciousness, and the resulting improvements in wellbeing through participation in The AIM Program of Energetic Healing. Host Mike Connor - www.emc2consciousness.com, Produced by Kevin Foresman - www.kevinforesman.com

item.title: The Secret Teachers, Oprah, and AIM on The Highest Ground
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: In this episode of Everything is Energy, join Rev. Dr. Michael Beckwith and James Ray from the movie The Secret as they discuss their experience as members of The AIM Program of Energetic Balancing with AIM developer Stephen Lewis, coauthor of Sanctuary The Path to Consciousness. This event was originally recorded the day after their appearance on the Oprah Show, and they present enlightening insights into the making of The Secret, this movies impact, their Oprah experience, and how the AIM Program for them is a natural extension of The Law of Attraction which they incorporate into their teachings. Host: Mike Connor www.emc2consciousness.com Produced by Kevin Foresman www.kevinforesman.com

item.itunes:subtitle: The Secret Teachers, Oprah, and AIM on The Highest Ground

item.title: Everything is Energy on The Highest Ground
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: The first episode of Everything is Energy with Stephen Lewis, the developer of The AIM Program of Energetic Healing and coauthor of the book Sanctuary:The Path to Consciousness. Stephen discusses the concept of energetic healing, energetic imbalances within our consciousness, and how the AIM Program can help you heal yourself by gaining access to healing frequencies available through this technology. For more info, please go to www.energeticmatrix.com Host: Mike Connor www.healinggrace.com Produced by Kevin Foresman www.kevinforesman.com

item.title: Tuning into The Law of Atraction Talk Radio- Sydney Chase and Julie Johnson
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: Sydney Chase and Julie Johnson co-host The Law of Attraction Radio Show at www.blogtalkradio.com. In this episode, Sydney in New York and Julie in California will be joining us to discuss their personal experience with The Law of Attraction, common questions and issues they talk with their listeners about, and practical examples and illustrations which you can use to put this powerful principle into effect in your life. Go with the flow and tune into the frequency of The Law of Attraction Radio found here on The Highest Ground. Host: Kevin Foresman www.kevinforesman.com

item.title: Unconditional Freedom - Dr. Claude Windenberger
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: You can live your life of unconditional freedom right now! This is your opportunity to create your own show using your questions for Dr. Claude and me, Kevin Foresman, host of The Highest Ground. Go to www.askdrclaude.com to submit your ideas for this episode, and the five people picked will receive a special gift from us to you. Join with Master Motivator, Quantum Physicist, and creator of the Unconditional Freedom Technique, Dr. Claude Windenberger, as we unraveling your secrets to unlocking Unconditional Freedom for you, next time on The Highest Ground; Host: Kevin Foresman

item.title: Spiritual Attraction - Jen Blackert
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: High conscious use of The Law of Attraction greatly increases the volume and quality of the manifestations you need as you market yourself and your business to the world. Jen Blackert, The Attraction & Success Coach, teaches proven attraction and success strategies that allows smart business owners to become more focused and aligned with their true, authentic success. Learn how we can apply this to our personal relationships as well. Call in to connect with Jen as we discuss her experience with The Law of Attraction, her insightful marketing wisdom, and her own personal spiritual journey as we contemplate Spiritual Attraction in this moment on The Highest Ground. Host: Kevin Foresman
item.itunes:author: kforesman
item.itunes:subtitle: Spiritual Attraction - Jen Blackert

item.title: The Breakthrough Experience-Dr. Demartini of The Secret
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: If what you desire is greater clarity of purpose, self worth, love, appreciation, certainty and masterful presence then The Breakthrough Experience is for you. It is a new way of living and an investment that pays dividends for the rest of your life. The primary methodology offered within The Breakthrough Experience is The Demartini Method. Derived from the study of Quantum Physics, The Demartini Method is a predetermined set of questions and actions that neutralizes your emotional charges and brings balance to your mind and body. A fully reproducible science you can take home with you, it enables you to discover the underlying order governing your apparent daily chaos.Call in to be part of this live, very special one hour episode with Dr. Demartini of The Secret as we share a breakthrough experience together on The Highest Ground.Host: Kevin Foresman

item.title: Virtue Coaching - Laura Morgan
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: Virtues are described in sacred literature as qualities of the human spirit, our innate capacity and inner power. As your Virtue Coach, Laure Morgan teaches that the answers to anything you face in your life are found from within ourselves. Join in the conversation with Laura Morgan as she skillfully guides us down the path towards recognizing our inner truths on The Highest Ground. Host: Kevin Foresman

item.title: The Path to Consciousness - Stephen Lewis
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: Stephen Lewis is the author of "Sanctuary:The Path to Consciousness" and Founder of The Aim Program. This groundbreaking process allows you to self heal through energetic balancing. We'll discuss consciousness and healing, quantum physics, The Secret, and my personal experience with The Aim Program. Listen in as we tap into the energetic matrix with Stephen Lewis on The Highest Ground. Host: Kevin Foresman

item.title: Divine Reach Coaching with Shama Hyder
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: Shama Hyder is a an amazing woman and dynamic motivator. Inspired by The Law of Attraction, Shama created Divine Reach Coaching, which helps individuals and companies reach their true potential. Call in and talk with Success Coach and Speaker Shama Hyder to experience the phenomenal WOW coaching process, as she helps us reach towards the divine on The Highest Ground. Host: Kevin Foresman

item.title: In The Field of Healing Grace - Mike Connor
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: Healing Grace is the frequency of highly conscious energy that allows us to connect with the One Mind vibration of the Universe. Besides facilitating this experience for his clients, Mike Connor also works with Stephen Lewis, founder of EMC2 and the Aim Program. Enjoy his take on The Law of Attraction and his recent visits with Michael Beckwith, James Arthur Ray, and Dr. Demartini of the film, The Secret. Call in to join us in the field of Healing Grace with Mike Connor, this Thursday 8pm EST on The Highest Ground. Host: Kevin Foresman

item.title: The Everyday Psychic - Debbie Fletcher
item.author: kfo@kevinforesman.com
item.description: What does it mean today to be "psychic?" We explore this ability, which many believe is more natural than not, with Debbie Fletcher, Co-Founder of The Column Center in Dallas, Texas. Could you be "psychic?" Tune in, listen and join in the conversation with host Kevin Foresman on "A Higher Ground."
